name: Infrastructure Review
description: Review tinyland-inc infrastructure repositories for drift, stale configs, and security issues
process: Fetch and review GloriousFlywheel repo for stale Terraform configs
Fetch and review tinyland-infra repo for drift from live state
Fetch and review outbot-ci repo for outdated CI templates
Check each repo for security alerts via github_list_alerts()
Report findings: infrastructure drift, stale configs, security issues, dependency freshness
